00007 #include "Compressor.h"

00009 #include "Timer.h"
00010 #include "Utility.h"

00021 static void compressorChecker(Compressor *c)
00022 {
00023     while (1)
00024     {
00025         if (c->Enabled())
00026         {
00027             c->SetRelayValue( c->GetPressureSwitchValue() == 0 ? Relay::kOn : Relay::kOff );
00028         }
00029         else
00030         {
00031             c->SetRelayValue(Relay::kOff);
00032         }
00033         Wait(0.5);
00034     }
00035 }
00036 
00045 void Compressor::InitCompressor(UINT32 pressureSwitchSlot,
00046         UINT32 pressureSwitchChannel,
00047         UINT32 compresssorRelaySlot,
00048         UINT32 compressorRelayChannel)
00049 {
00050     CheckDigitalModule(pressureSwitchSlot);
00051     CheckRelayModule(compresssorRelaySlot);
00052     CheckDigitalChannel(pressureSwitchChannel);
00053     CheckRelayChannel(compressorRelayChannel);
00054 
00055     m_enabled = false;
00056     m_pressureSwitch = new DigitalInput(pressureSwitchSlot, pressureSwitchChannel);
00057     m_relay = new Relay(compresssorRelaySlot, compressorRelayChannel, Relay::kForwardOnly);
00058 
00059     if (!m_task.Start((INT32)this))
00060     {
00061         wpi_fatal(CompressorTaskError);
00062     }
00063 }
00064 
00076 Compressor::Compressor(UINT32 pressureSwitchSlot,
00077         UINT32 pressureSwitchChannel,
00078         UINT32 compresssorRelaySlot,
00079         UINT32 compressorRelayChannel)
00080     : m_task ("Compressor", (FUNCPTR)compressorChecker)
00081 {
00082     InitCompressor(pressureSwitchSlot,
00083         pressureSwitchChannel,
00084         compresssorRelaySlot,
00085         compressorRelayChannel);
00086 }
00087 
00098 Compressor::Compressor(UINT32 pressureSwitchChannel, UINT32 compressorRelayChannel)
00099     : m_task ("Compressor", (FUNCPTR)compressorChecker)
00100 {
00101     InitCompressor(GetDefaultDigitalModule(),
00102             pressureSwitchChannel,
00103             GetDefaultDigitalModule(),
00104             compressorRelayChannel);
00105 }
00106 
00112 Compressor::~Compressor()
00113 {
00114     delete m_pressureSwitch;
00115     delete m_relay;
00116 }
00117 
00123 void Compressor::SetRelayValue(Relay::Value relayValue)
00124 {
00125     m_relay->Set(relayValue);
00126 }
00127 
00134 UINT32 Compressor::GetPressureSwitchValue()
00135 {
00136     return m_pressureSwitch->Get();
00137 }
00138 
00144 void Compressor::Start()
00145 {
00146     m_enabled = true;
00147 }
00148 
00153 void Compressor::Stop()
00154 {
00155     m_enabled = false;
00156 }
00157 
00165 bool Compressor::Enabled()
00166 {
00167     return m_enabled;
00168 }
